column1: Bath and Body Works White Barn Champagne Toast 3 Wick Candle 14.5 Ounce Basic White Barn Label, Scented

column2: #16,792 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)

column1: Elevate your celebrations with the Bath and Body Works White Barn Champagne Toast 3-Wick Candle. Infused with a festive blend of bubbly champagne, juicy nectarine, and blackcurrant, this 14.5 oz candle creates an atmosphere of joy and sophistication. The Basic White Barn Label adds a touch of classic elegance to your decor, making it the perfect scented centerpiece for any occasion. Illuminate your space with the radiant glow of three wicks and let the Champagne Toast fragrance set the mood for memorable moments and festive cheer. (Candle Artwork/Color May Vary as Seasonally Refreshed by Manufacturer).
Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with skin and eyes.
